page.title: 09Gt.Coxwell - House Interiors
page.content: A reasonable standard of living is enjoyed by all village residents & about two-thirds can be considered affluent by today's standards (against a background of 3.5 million unemployed in Britain).Most have two cars per family & many of the following:- auto- matic washing machine,dish washer, freezer,refrigerator,colour television video & hi-fi equipment.Most houses are centrally heated by gas,oil,coal, electricity or wood;the others have open fires. Many families keep pets such as dogs, cats,rabbits,guinea-pigs and cage birds.Other domestic animals owned by families are goats,horses and poultry.
